item.title: 'Move' Programming Language: The Highlight of Libra
item.description: Among publications of Libra, the most attractive thing would be the brand new ‘Move’ programming language. After the first glance at ‘Move’ whitepaper, we came to the idea that this is the future of smart contract language.
